title: 08/20/2021 DPS Hour 3 Ric Bucher
itunes:title: 08/20/2021 DPS Hour 3 Ric Bucher
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker, in for Dan, discuss the latest news around NFL training camp. Rob explains why he believes Tom Brady's son getting a ball boy job is indicative of a much bigger issue of nepotism in the NFL. FS1 NBA Insider Ric Bucher joins the guys to talk LeBron James taking offense to league opinions yet again, Kevin Durant and Draymond Green burying Warriors management, and the biggest winners of the NBA offseason. Plus, the guys tell you if Trevor Bauer could actually return to the Dodgers, and the door for Aaron Rodgers to host Jeopardy has reopened!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
